backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining ExerciseTemplate (with id, name, sets array, comments), WorkoutSession, and WorkoutExercise types, plus CRUD operations for exercise templates and workout session management with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old exercise format (id, name only) to new ExerciseTemplate format by adding default 3 sets with zero weight/reps and empty comments field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features for updating AddExerciseForm, ExercisePicker, ExerciseTracker, and ExerciseListItem components to support exercise templates with 3 sets (weight/reps) and comments.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components and pages that handle exercise templates with set values, workout session creation, active workout tracking, and history display.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system configured for dark theme using amber/orange accent colors instead of typical blue/purple palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Track-A-Swole application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including home, exercise library, session creation, active workout (with exerciseIds search param), and workout history with session detail.
Form component for creating exercise templates with name input, 3 sets with weight/reps number inputs, comments textarea, validation, and submission handling using useAddExercise mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CompletedExercis: Read-only card component displaying completed exercise details in a table format with set number, weight, reps columns, and optional comments section below.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseListItem: Displays a single exercise template with inline editing and deletion capabilities. Supports editing exercise name (backend limitation) with validation, and shows sets/comments in read-only mode during edit.
frontend/src/components/ExercisePicker.t: Dropdown selector for choosing exercises from a library with an 'Add' button. Displays exercise name and default set values (weight√óreps) in the dropdown options.
Collapsible card for tracking exercise completion during a workout session. Allows editing sets (weight/reps) and comments, with visual indicators for completion status and data entry.
frontend/src/components/HistorySessionCa: Clickable card displaying a completed workout session summary with date, name, and exercise count. Navigates to detailed session view on click.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with sticky header, bottom navigation bar (Home, Library, New, History), and footer. Includes active route highlighting and Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/SessionExerciseL: Displays selected exercises for a workout session with reordering (up/down) and removal controls. Shows exercise name and default set values for each item.
frontend/src/components/SetInputRow.tsx: Simple input row component for entering weight and reps for a single set. Supports disabled state and numeric validation with min/step attributes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the Internet Computer backend actor with authentication. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including exercises (CRUD), workout sessions, and workout history with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color schemes and typography settings using Inter font family.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ActiveWorkout.tsx: Manages active workout session page where users track exercises with sets/reps/weight, mark exercises complete, and save the entire workout to backend.
frontend/src/pages/CreateSession.tsx: Allows users to create a new workout session by naming it, selecting exercises from library, reordering them, then navigating to the active workout page with selected exercise IDs.
frontend/src/pages/ExerciseLibrary.tsx: Displays user's exercise template library with CRUD operations, showing templates with default set values that can be added via a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page component displaying welcome message and four navigation cards linking to Exercise Library, New Session, Workout History, and Progress pages with amber/orange gradient styling.
frontend/src/pages/SessionDetail.tsx: Displays detailed view of a single workout session including name, date, and completed exercises with sets/reps/weights using the CompletedExerciseDisplay component.
frontend/src/pages/WorkoutHistory.tsx: Lists all past workout sessions using HistorySessionCard components, showing loading state and empty state when no workouts exist.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, border radius variables, animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking Track-A-Swole workout app features including exercise library, workout sessions with 3-set structure, history viewing, and dark theme with amber/orange styling.
